titleStmt.title: The comfort and crown of great actions. In a sermon preached, Decemb. 4. 1657. Before the honorable East-India company. By Edward Reynolds, D.D.
titleStmt.author: Reynolds, Edward, 1599-1676.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Tho. Newcomb, for George Thomason at the Rose and Crown in St Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Running title reads: The crown of great actions.
Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
